import sys

n, h, l, r = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

dp = [[0] * h for _ in range(n)]

for i in range(1, n):
    for j in range(h):
        dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j], dp[i-1][(j+a[i-1]) % h])

        if l <= (j+a[i-1]) % h <= r:
            dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i-1][j]+1)

print(max(dp[n-1]))

n,h,l,r = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

t = 0
c = 0
for i in range(n):
    t += a[i]
    if l <= t%h <= r:
        c += 1
print(c)

import sys

n,h,l,r = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
a = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))

dp = [[0] * h for _ in range(n+1)]

for i in range(1,n+1):
    for j in range(h):
        dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i-1][(j+a[i-1])%h])

        if l<=(j+a[i-1])%h<=r:
            dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j]+1)

print(max(dp[n]))

import sys

n, h, l, r = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

dp = [[0] * h for _ in range(n)]

for i in range(1, n):
    for j in range(h):  # j: 今回の睡眠時間
        dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j], dp[i-1][(j+a[i-1]) % h])

        if l <= (j+a[i-1]) % h <= r:
            dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i-1][j]+1)

print(max(dp[n-1]))  # 最後の一日までの最大値
